title: Video still auto plays even though AutoPlay is blocked for both Audio and Video
content:
On certain websites , the audio and video still auto play even though the option, "AutoPlay" is blocked for both audio and video.

Please see the attached screenshot which shows that auto play is blocked, it is circled in red. While the video has auto played, circled in orange with a timestamp of 17 seconds being played prior to it being manually stopped.

Please fix this issue.
creator: LimuxSpring

title: Firefox Nightly crashes every time I try to zoom in using my touch-pad
content:
As the title states, every time I try to zoom into a page using pinch and zoom with my touch-pad, firefox nightly crashes. However, if I try to zoom in using CTRL+ and CTRL-, it works just fine.

I have tried to disable hardware acceleration but it didnt help.

These are the logs which I obtained from the crash reporter: AdapterDeviceID: 0x46a8 AdapterDriverVendor: mesa/iris AdapterDriverVersion: 24.2.8.0 AdapterVendorID: 0x8086 AvailablePageFile: 1012457472 AvailablePhysicalMemory: 10165415936 AvailableSwapMemory: 2000678912 AvailableVirtualMemory: 12812111872 BackgroundTaskMode: 0 BuildID: 20250613160838 ContentSandboxCapabilities: 119 ContentSandboxCapable: 1 ContentSandboxLevel: 6 CrashTime: 1750302886 DOMFissionEnabled: 1 DOMIPCEnabled: 1 DesktopEnvironment: ubuntu:gnome EMCheckCompatibility: true EventLoopNestingLevel: 1 GpuSandboxLevel: 0 GraphicsCriticalError: |[0][GFX1-]: RenderCompositorSWGL failed mapping default framebuffer, no dt (t=148.335) GraphicsNumActiveRenderers: 2 GraphicsNumRenderers: 1 HeadlessMode: 0 InstallTime: 1749869266 IsWayland: 1 LastStartupWasCrash: 0 LinuxUnderMemoryPressure: 0 MozCrashReason: internal error: entered unreachable code NimbusEnrollments: upgrade-spotlight-rollout:treatment,fx-accounts-ping-release-rollout-2:control,disable-ads-startup-cache:control,desktop-nightly-show-relay-to-13501-logged-out-users:synthetic-control,desktop-credit-card-autofill-global-enablement-rollout-nightly:creditcard-enable,enable-enrollment-status-telemetry-in-firefox-desktop:control,desktop-address-autofill-india-nightly-rollout:control,fpp-screen-avail-hardware-concurrency-desktop:control,hide-descriptions-on-newtab-articles-fix-rollout:control Notes: Ubuntu Core 24FP(D10-L1000-W0000000-T01) WR? title: Emails with html content
content: Firefox no longer opens up an html page when the link is in the email. The link can be opened manually. I have received email notifications that my email program does not handle html content emails. This started a couple of weeks or a month or so ago. I suspected Thunderbird was the problem so I removed it and installed the latest version. No change everything the same. So is the problem in Firefox ? As I installed Firfox with Ubuntu I need to wait on Ubuntu to fix the problem. If I delete Firefox and install directly will I lose all my links etc ? de Barry bewhite@bigpond.net.au ps could this be related to the well known Telstra fault in bigpond.net.au services ?
creator: vk2aab
